div.head: 冷熱
div.div: cold and heat; cold or hot

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: cold and heat; cold or hot

sense.def: Combined Designation of 冷 and 熱 . CC, PQ, EA, IS. Pathological Condition identical with han re 寒熱 , cold and heat; cold or hot. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 1: 心腹痛皆宿結冷熱所為 , “Pain in the heart and abdominal region, this is always caused by bound cold and heat having settled there”.
